sentences.en: a born athlete/writer/leader
sentences.cn: 天生的运动员 / 作家 / 领袖

sentences.en: A born magpie, Mandy collects any object that catches her eye.
sentences.cn: 曼迪天生喜欢收集小玩意，只要是她看上的都会收藏起来。

sentences.en: a newly-born baby
sentences.cn: 新生儿，初生婴儿

sentences.en: Almost 80 percent of the state's residents were born elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 该州居民中几乎有80%出生在异地。

sentences.en: Eric Edward Bullus was born in Peterborough, the second of five children.
sentences.cn: 埃里克·爱德华·布勒斯出生于彼得伯勒，是5个孩子中的老二。

sentences.en: Forty lambs were born this spring.
sentences.cn: 今年春天有40头小羊羔出生。

sentences.en: he was a Cambridge man born and bred.
sentences.cn: 他是土生土长的剑桥人。

sentences.en: he was a Cambridge man born and bred.
sentences.cn: 他是土生土长的剑桥人。

sentences.en: he was a Cambridge man born and bred.
sentences.cn: 他是土生土长的剑桥人。

sentences.en: He was born and grew up in the Flatbush neighbourhood of Brooklyn.
sentences.cn: 他出生在布鲁克林的弗拉特布什一带，并在那儿长大成人。

sentences.en: He was born in Yamagata prefecture, north of Tokyo.
sentences.cn: 他出生在东京以北的山形县。

sentences.en: I think he was born to be editor of a tabloid newspaper.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他天生就是当小报编辑的料。

sentences.en: I was born and raised (=  was born and grew up  ) in Alabama.
sentences.cn: 我是土生土长的亚拉巴马人。

sentences.en: in all my born days I've never seen the like of it.
sentences.cn: 我这一生从没见过这样的事。

sentences.en: Jack was a born teacher.
sentences.cn: 杰克是个天生的教师。

sentences.en: Many children are now born into or raised in one-parent families.
sentences.cn: 现在很多孩子在单亲家庭中出生或成长。

sentences.en: She was born in Austria on March 6, 1920.
sentences.cn: 她于1920年3月6日出生在奥地利。

sentences.en: She was born in the middle of a rain storm.
sentences.cn: 她出生在一场暴风雨中。

sentences.en: She was born Jenny Harvey on June 11, 1946.
sentences.cn: 她在1946年6月11号出生，取名叫珍妮·哈维。

sentences.en: Stan Laurel was born at number 3, Argyll Street.
sentences.cn: 斯坦·劳雷尔出生在阿盖尔街3号。

sentences.en: The baby was born three months early weighing only 3 lb 5oz.
sentences.cn: 婴儿早产3个月，体重只有3磅5盎司。

sentences.en: the queen’s firstborn son
sentences.cn: 女王的长子

sentences.en: the skill of a born actor
sentences.cn: 天生的表演技巧

sentences.en: Two thousand grey seal pups are born there every autumn.
sentences.cn: 那里每年秋天有2,000头灰色小海豹出生。

sentences.en: Was he born to be successful, or did he just luck out?
sentences.cn: 是他命中注定会成功，还是仅仅交了好运？

sentences.en: When Michael was born I was on cloud nine.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔出生的时候，我都乐得找不着北了。

phrases.phrase: be born with a silver spoon in one's mouth
born on the wrong side of the blanket

phrases.tran_cn: 天生大赢家；强者的诞生；生而为赢

phrases.phrase: there's one (或 a sucker) born every minute

trans.tran_en: someone who has a strong natural ability to lead, play music etc

trans.tran_cn: (Born)人名；(柬)邦；(英、西、俄、捷、德、瑞典、匈)博恩
出生，天生，形成，产生（仅用于被动语态）
trans.tran_en: when a person or animal is born, they come out of their mother’s body or out of an egg
